metadata.description: During the American Civil War, The Shenandoah Valley Campaign of Confederate Maj. Gen. Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson is considered one of the great military campaigns in American history.  Jackson's success turned him into a legendary figure on both sides of the conflict and now noted historical author and comic book artist, Wayne Vansant (Days of Darkness, Knights of the Skull, Days of Wrath) gives his comprehensive look at Stonewall Jackson and the great campaign that saved the South for a few more years during this bloody time in United States history.
metadata.name: Stonewall in the Shenandoah
